summary: Consume Google Docs API to perform operations like creating, getting, and updating documents.

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: Choose the authentication method, either Service Account or OAuth2.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to work with, such as Document or Custom API Call.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Choose the operation to perform on the selected resource, like Create, Get, or Update a document.

parameters.name: driveId
parameters.description: Select or specify the Drive Name or ID where the document will be created.

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: Select or specify the Folder Name or ID where the document will be created.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Specify the title of the document to be created.

parameters.name: documentURL
parameters.description: Provide the Doc ID or URL of the document to get or update.

parameters.name: simple
parameters.description: Choose whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data.
